page.title: 09WINDMILLS ON SCORAIG
page.content: THERE IS A WINDMILL-MAKER ON SCORAIG.HE MAKES ABOUT 2 A YEAR.MOST WINDMILLS ARE SOLD TO SCORAIG PEOPLE AS THERE IS NO MAINS ELECTRICITY. A WINDMILL'S MAIN PARTS ARE THE DYNAMO AND GENERATOR.SOME PARTS ARE BOUGHT,SOME HOMEMADE.THEY ARE PAINTED DIFFERENT COLOURS ACCORDING TO THE WISHES OF THE BUYER.THE TAIL VANE IS ALSO OFTEN DESIGNED BY THE BUYER.THE WINDMILL IS MOUNTED ON A POLE OBTAINED FROM A SCRAPYARD. THE WINDMILL CONVERTS ENERGY IN THE WIND TO ELECTRICAL ENERGY WHICH IS THEN STORED IN BATTERIES.MOST BUYERS HAVE A BANK OF 12-VOLT BATTERIES AND FROM THEM THEY RUN LIGHTING AND SMALL ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES SUCH AS T.V.,RADIO,COMPUTER,LIGHTS.
